page.title: 11The Herts Advertiser (contd)
page.content: There are many ways to get news of a story, but the 4 main ones are from the Police, Council meetings, Court, and people telling the paper. Important news stories during 1985 have included the first test tube baby born in St. Albans, Â£220,000 shot gun robbery, Â£64,000 bank robbery; but the most important story has been the coach crash in France because it affected St. Albans so much. There were children involved from 2 local secondary schools, Beaumont and Verulam. When I asked Mr. Richardson about the number of advertisements, he said that he did not print any more than an ordinary newspaper. Every paper needs advertisers because they pay 99% of the costs. They have to pay for the printing paper and the upkeep of the printing machines and the building, plus other expenses.
